title: Elana Scherr
description: Making our way through the Motortrend & Hot Road staff this week we welcome Elana Scherr (@challengeher) into the studio.  Both Elana and Matt had the good fortune to spend a bit of time with the new Dodge Challenger Wildcat and it's genrous helping of 707HP. Elana is a horder of classic vehicles and we discuss her Opel GT, 70 Challenger, 76 Dart and how to write them off as business expenses.  Additionally we cover how heroin preserves Mötley Crüe and The Rolling Stones, letters from the DMV and Zack's search for a new daily driver.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
